alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:30PM CDT until May 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...SOUTHWESTERN HAWKINS...WESTERN HANCOCK...NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHWESTERN GREENE...GRAINGER AND HAMBLEN COUNTIES... At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Sneedville to 10 miles east of Russellville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Jefferson City, Rogersville, Sneedville, Rutledge, Bean Station, White Pine, Russellville, Mosheim and Bulls Gap. This includes Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 4 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee...and southwestern Virginia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Claiborne; Grainger; Greene; Hamblen; Hancock; Hawkins; Jefferson
